name: Quest for BEEFY THUMBS
description:
Submission to the Shenanijam 2017 by Team Dageki

Hop your way to the top to get the only thing that can beef your thumbs up right, the HOTDOG TACO NOODLE!!

This is a stupid simple platformer game using arrow keys to move around and get to the top of the mountain to get the desired food.

Big thanks to the team: Dan (art) and Gareth (music/sfx) and to Butterscotch Shenanigans for providing the fuel to light the fire under my tuchus and hosting this Jam!
